events.text: We, the American Marines, we are here on a mission, to find and rescue our allies who are scattered across the hostile area and you soldier, has been chosen to perform a very important task. Listen and translate the messages sent by our allies, so that the extraction team rescues our allies from this terrible war
Our allies send messages in morse code, you were chosen because you already have knowledge of morse code, so do your best to help our country and our allies
